entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
